post.author: Adrian Carmack
post.body:
ok, i made my own tree model in max, and exported to *.ASE format

now, how i can apply my wood texture into the model???

post.author: kat
post.body:
You need to add a UVWmap to that model and then texture it.

That's the short answer.

The long answer is too long and it's probably best you either search for tutorials on UVWmapping or read the manual that came with the app when you bought it.
